entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:55 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 2:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
